raw:
{ "html_pages": [ "

High in the sky, a tiny star named Stella twinkles and shines so bright.

在高高的天空中，一颗名叫斯特拉的小星星闪烁着明亮的光芒。

", "

Warm and glowing Papa sun smiles and says 'Welcome to our solar system!'

温暖发光的太阳爸爸微笑着说："欢迎来到我们的太阳系！"

", "

Stella counts eight colorful planets dancing around Papa Sun.

斯特拉数着八颗围绕太阳爸爸跳舞的彩色行星。

", "

Earth is a beautiful blue planet where people and animals make their home.

地球是一颗美丽的蓝色星球，人类和动物们在这里安居乐业。

", "

Luna the Moon shows Stella how she changes from round to crescent each night.

月亮露娜向斯特拉展示她每晚是如何从圆月变成新月的。

", "

Rocky the Asteroid teaches Stella how to float and spin through space.

小行星洛奇教斯特拉如何在太空中漂浮和旋转。

", "

Stella watches Earth turn around to make day become night.

斯特拉看着地球转动，白天变成黑夜。

", "

Stella plays a fun game connecting stars to make constellation pictures.

斯特拉玩着一个有趣的游戏，把星星连接起来组成星座图案。

", "

A friendly silver rocket zooms past Stella on its space adventure.

一艘友好的银色火箭在太空冒险时从斯特拉身边呼啸而过。

", "

Stella smiles, knowing our universe is filled with wonderful things to discover.

斯特拉微笑着，知道我们的宇宙充满了等待发现的奇妙事物。

" ] }

tasks_output.description: Based on the user input "The modern cosmology about the universe, its birth, evolution and different types of Celestial bodies" and target age group "1-6", research the latest topics and themes. Use Wikipedia and other sources to gather background information and educational elements. Use simple language to explain hard concepts for children. Establish a final theme for a picture book, then determine the key educational elements.
tasks_output.name: research_story_theme_task
tasks_output.expected_output: Final theme for a picture book, key educational elements. Must follow user's input "The modern cosmology about the universe, its birth, evolution and different types of Celestial bodies".
tasks_output.summary: Based on the user input "The modern cosmology about the...
tasks_output.raw:
{
  "theme": "Stella's Cosmic Journey: A Little Star's Adventure Through Our Amazing Universe",
  "educational_elements": [
    "Introduction to the Sun as our special star that gives light and warmth",
    "Basic shapes and colors of celestial bodies (round planets, twinkling stars, colorful nebulas)",
    "Day and night cycle explained through Earth's rotation",
    "Different types of visible celestial objects (Moon, planets, stars)",
    "Simple counting opportunities with planets and stars",
    "Basic size comparisons (Sun is bigger than Earth, Earth is bigger than Moon)",
    "Observable sky phenomena (shooting stars, Moon phases)",
    "Simple weather patterns related to the Sun (sunny day, cloudy day)",
    "Basic directional concepts (up in the sky, down on Earth)",
    "Introduction to space exploration through friendly spacecraft characters",
    "Simple facts about each planet in our solar system",
    "Basic concepts about gravity (things float in space)",
    "Light and dark in space (stars shine in the dark)",
    "Introduction to constellations as connect-the-dot pictures in the sky",
    "Simple vocabulary building (planet, star, moon, space, universe)",
    "Basic emotions through cosmic characters (happy Sun, sleepy Moon)",
    "Color recognition through different planets and stars",
    "Simple patterns in space (repeating star patterns, planet rings)",
    "Basic concepts of distance (some stars are far away, Moon is closer)",
    "Introduction to the concept of time through day/night cycle"
  ]
}

json_dict.theme: Stella's Cosmic Journey: A Little Star's Adventure Through Our Amazing Universe
educational_elements: Introduction to the Sun as our special star that gives light and warmth
Basic shapes and colors of celestial bodies (round planets, twinkling stars, colorful nebulas)
Day and night cycle explained through Earth's rotation
Different types of visible celestial objects (Moon, planets, stars)
Simple counting opportunities with planets and stars
Basic size comparisons (Sun is bigger than Earth, Earth is bigger than Moon)
Observable sky phenomena (shooting stars, Moon phases)
Simple weather patterns related to the Sun (sunny day, cloudy day)
Basic directional concepts (up in the sky, down on Earth)
Introduction to space exploration through friendly spacecraft characters
Simple facts about each planet in our solar system
Basic concepts about gravity (things float in space)
Light and dark in space (stars shine in the dark)
Introduction to constellations as connect-the-dot pictures in the sky
Simple vocabulary building (planet, star, moon, space, universe)
Basic emotions through cosmic characters (happy Sun, sleepy Moon)
Color recognition through different planets and stars
Simple patterns in space (repeating star patterns, planet rings)
Basic concepts of distance (some stars are far away, Moon is closer)
Introduction to the concept of time through day/night cycle

tasks_output.description:
Create a detailed story outline based on the research findings and user requirements "The modern cosmology about the universe, its birth, evolution and different types of Celestial bodies". Plan the narrative structure for a picture book appropriate for age "1-6", including character development, plot points, and page-by-page story progression. Ensure the story length and complexity align with the target age group's attention span and comprehension level.
Note: One page consists of a core vocabulary word, one simple English sentence, and its translation. (one-to-one)
tasks_output.name: develop_story_outline_task
tasks_output.expected_output: Title of the book, character descriptions, plot points, core vocabulary words, and educational elements.
tasks_output.summary: Create a detailed story outline based on the research findings...

json_dict.title: Stella's Cosmic Journey: A Little Star's Adventure Through Our Amazing Universe
character_descriptions: Stella - A curious young star who loves to explore and learn about the universe
Papa Sun - The wise, warm, and friendly center of our solar system
Luna - A gentle Moon who teaches Stella about phases and tides
Rocky - A playful asteroid who helps explain space objects
The Planet Pals - Eight unique planet characters with distinct personalities

pages.plot_point: Meet Stella, a tiny star who twinkles bright in the night sky.
pages.educational_elements: Introduction to stars as bright objects in space

pages.plot_point: Papa Sun welcomes Stella to learn about our solar system.
pages.educational_elements: Sun as the center of our solar system, source of light and warmth

pages.plot_point: Stella counts the eight Planet Pals spinning around Papa Sun.
Stella visits Earth, the blue planet where people live.
pages.educational_elements: Earth's unique features - water, land, and atmosphere

pages.plot_point: Luna the Moon shows Stella how she changes shape each night.
Rocky the asteroid teaches Stella about floating in space.
pages.educational_elements: Simple concept of gravity and movement in space

pages.plot_point: Stella watches Earth spin to make day and night.
Stella plays connect-the-dots with other stars to make pictures.
A friendly rocket zooms by, exploring the universe.
Stella realizes how special our universe is and returns home to twinkle.
pages.educational_elements: Appreciation for space and cosmic wonder

Note: One page consists of a core vocabulary word, one simple English sentence, and its translation. (one-to-one)
tasks_output.name: write_story_content_task
tasks_output.expected_output: Complete story text broken down by pages, with age-appropriate language, engaging narrative, and consistent pacing throughout the book.

page_contents: High in the sky, a tiny star named Stella twinkles and shines so bright.
Warm and glowing Papa Sun smiles and says 'Welcome to our solar system!'
Stella counts eight colorful planets dancing around Papa Sun.
Earth is a beautiful blue planet where people and animals make their home.
Luna the Moon shows Stella how she changes from round to crescent each night.
Rocky the Asteroid teaches Stella how to float and spin through space.
Stella watches Earth turn around to make day become night.
Stella plays a fun game connecting stars to make constellation pictures.
A friendly silver rocket zooms past Stella on its space adventure.
Stella smiles, knowing our universe is filled with wonderful things to discover.

tasks_output.description: Develop comprehensive visual style guidelines for the book's illustrations based on the content and target age group "1-6". Create detailed image generation prompts for each page that maintain consistency in character design, color palette, and overall artistic direction.
tasks_output.name: design_art_direction_task
tasks_output.expected_output: Character design specifications, color palette, visual style guidelines.
tasks_output.summary: Develop comprehensive visual style guidelines for the book's illustrations based...
tasks_output.raw:
{
  "art_direction": "CHARACTER DESIGN SPECIFICATIONS:
- Stella (Star): Design as a cute, round star with big expressive eyes, rosy cheeks, and a gentle smile. Size should be approximately 20% of page width. Add subtle sparkle effects around edges.
- Papa Sun: Large, warm character with gentle facial features. Create radiating corona that appears like kind arms. Should occupy 30-40% of page when featured.
- Luna (Moon): Soft, curved character with dreamy expression. Design should work in both full and crescent shapes while maintaining recognizable features.
- Rocky (Asteroid): Small, playful character with textured surface but friendly appearance. Add small details like tiny craters that don't overwhelm.
- Planets: Each planet should have distinct personality while maintaining cohesive style. Use simplified but recognizable features (Saturn's rings, Jupiter's spot, Earth's continents).
- Rocket: Rounded edges, non-threatening design with cheerful colors. Should appear welcoming rather than technical.

COLOR PALETTE:
Primary Colors:
- Space Background: Deep indigo (#1B1B3A) to navy (#0C164F)
- Stella Gold: Warm yellow (#FFD700)
- Papa Sun Orange: Soft orange (#FFB347)
- Earth Blues: Sky blue (#87CEEB) to turquoise (#40E0D0)
- Luna Silver: Soft gray-white (#E1E5EA)
Accent Colors:
- Cosmic Pink: (#FFB6C1)
- Stardust Purple: (#9370DB)
- Planet Greens: (#98FF98)
- Gentle Red: (#FF6B6B)

VISUAL STYLE GUIDELINES:
1. Overall Aesthetic:
- Soft, rounded shapes with no sharp edges
- Gentle gradients instead of solid colors
- Subtle texture overlays for depth
- Warm, inviting glow effects around light sources

2. Composition Rules:
- Center important characters
- Leave 20% padding around edges for text
- Maintain clear figure-ground relationship
- Use curved design elements to guide eye movement

3. Illustration Technique:
- Vector-based style with subtle gradient overlays
- Minimal shadow usage (max 20% opacity)
- Star field backgrounds should be sparse and organized
- Limited detail level appropriate for young children

4. Movement and Energy:
- Gentle curved motion lines
- Floating/drifting effects for space elements
- Subtle twinkling animations if digital
- Smooth transitions between elements

5. Safety Considerations:
- No flashing or overwhelming patterns
- Avoid scary or threatening imagery
- Maintain consistent scale relationships
- Use soothing color combinations

6. Page-to-Page Consistency:
- Maintain character scale across scenes
- Use consistent lighting direction
- Keep color palette cohesive
- Repeat key visual elements as anchors

7. Text Integration:
- Leave clear space for text placement
- Use complementary visual elements to frame text
- Ensure sufficient contrast for readability
- Balance illustration and text space 60/40"
}

json_dict.art_direction:
CHARACTER DESIGN SPECIFICATIONS:
- Stella (Star): Design as a cute, round star with big expressive eyes, rosy cheeks, and a gentle smile. Size should be approximately 20% of page width. Add subtle sparkle effects around edges.
- Papa Sun: Large, warm character with gentle facial features. Create radiating corona that appears like kind arms. Should occupy 30-40% of page when featured.
- Luna (Moon): Soft, curved character with dreamy expression. Design should work in both full and crescent shapes while maintaining recognizable features.
- Rocky (Asteroid): Small, playful character with textured surface but friendly appearance. Add small details like tiny craters that don't overwhelm.
- Planets: Each planet should have distinct personality while maintaining cohesive style. Use simplified but recognizable features (Saturn's rings, Jupiter's spot, Earth's continents).
- Rocket: Rounded edges, non-threatening design with cheerful colors. Should appear welcoming rather than technical.

COLOR PALETTE:
Primary Colors:
- Space Background: Deep indigo (#1B1B3A) to navy (#0C164F)
- Stella Gold: Warm yellow (#FFD700)
- Papa Sun Orange: Soft orange (#FFB347)
- Earth Blues: Sky blue (#87CEEB) to turquoise (#40E0D0)
- Luna Silver: Soft gray-white (#E1E5EA)
Accent Colors:
- Cosmic Pink: (#FFB6C1)
- Stardust Purple: (#9370DB)
- Planet Greens: (#98FF98)
- Gentle Red: (#FF6B6B)

VISUAL STYLE GUIDELINES:
1. Overall Aesthetic:
- Soft, rounded shapes with no sharp edges
- Gentle gradients instead of solid colors
- Subtle texture overlays for depth
- Warm, inviting glow effects around light sources

2. Composition Rules:
- Center important characters
- Leave 20% padding around edges for text
- Maintain clear figure-ground relationship
- Use curved design elements to guide eye movement

3. Illustration Technique:
- Vector-based style with subtle gradient overlays
- Minimal shadow usage (max 20% opacity)
- Star field backgrounds should be sparse and organized
- Limited detail level appropriate for young children

4. Movement and Energy:
- Gentle curved motion lines
- Floating/drifting effects for space elements
- Subtle twinkling animations if digital
- Smooth transitions between elements

5. Safety Considerations:
- No flashing or overwhelming patterns
- Avoid scary or threatening imagery
- Maintain consistent scale relationships
- Use soothing color combinations

6. Page-to-Page Consistency:
- Maintain character scale across scenes
- Use consistent lighting direction
- Keep color palette cohesive
- Repeat key visual elements as anchors

7. Text Integration:
- Leave clear space for text placement
- Use complementary visual elements to frame text
- Ensure sufficient contrast for readability
- Balance illustration and text space 60/40

tasks_output.description:
Using AI image generation tools, create illustrations for each page following the art direction guidelines and content. Generate multiple variations for each scene to ensure the best possible visual representation. Ensure illustrations are engaging and appropriate for "1-6".
Note: One illustration for one page (one-to-one)
tasks_output.name: create_illustrations_task
tasks_output.expected_output: High-quality AI illustration prompts (e.g. for Midjourney) for each page that align with the art direction, content, and age-appropriate visual complexity.
tasks_output.summary: Using AI image generation tools, create illustrations for each page...
tasks_output.raw:
{
  "illustration_prompts": [
    "Cute cartoon baby star character with big expressive eyes and rosy cheeks, twinkling against a deep indigo space background, soft rounded shapes, gentle gradients, warm yellow glow (#FFD700), playful and friendly appearance, simple star field in background, children's book style, vector art aesthetic",
    
    "Large friendly sun character with gentle smile and warm orange glow (#FFB347), radiating corona like kind arms, welcoming pose, deep space background (#1B1B3A), soft gradients, cute small star character nearby for scale, children's book style, vector art aesthetic",
    
    "Eight adorable planet characters in orbit formation, each with unique cheerful expressions, simplified recognizable features, cute small star character in foreground, warm glowing sun in center, gentle curved motion lines, soft color palette, children's book style, vector art aesthetic",
    
    "Beautiful blue and turquoise Earth character (#87CEEB, #40E0D0) with friendly face, simplified continents, fluffy white clouds, cute small star character visiting, warm welcoming atmosphere, gentle glow effects, children's book style, vector art aesthetic",
    
    "Gentle silver-white moon character (#E1E5EA) showing different phases, dreamy expression, cute star character watching with wonder, soft purple space background (#9370DB), twinkling stars, rounded shapes, children's book style, vector art aesthetic",
    
    "Playful small asteroid character with friendly face and tiny craters, teaching cute star character how to float, gentle motion lines, deep space background with soft gradients, warm lighting, children's book style, vector art aesthetic",
    
    "Earth character slowly spinning with day and night sides, cute star character watching with fascination, soft light transitions, gentle blues and indigos, warm sunlight on day side, twinkling stars on night side, children's book style, vector art aesthetic",
    
    "Cute star character connecting bright stars with gentle light trails, forming simple constellation patterns, deep purple space background (#9370DB), soft glowing effects, playful composition, children's book style, vector art aesthetic",
    
    "Friendly silver rocket with rounded edges and cheerful colors, gentle vapor trail, cute star character watching with wonder, deep space background with sparse stars, soft lighting, children's book style, vector art aesthetic",
    
    "Cute star character twinkling happily, surrounded by simplified space elements (planets, moon, sun, stars), warm color palette, gentle glow effects, celebrating the wonder of space, children's book style, vector art aesthetic"
  ]
}

Generate actual illustrations using AI image generation tools based on the prompts created. Ensure all images are generated at a consistent resolution of 1280x720 pixels or lower to maintain quality while optimizing file size. Save each generated image and track the file paths.
Note: One illustration for one page (one-to-one)

tasks_output.description:
Generate HTML pages that combine text content, translations, and illustrations into a cohesive layout suitable for A4 paper printing. For each page:
1. Layout Requirements:
   - A4 page size
   - Proper margins and spacing

2. Content Integration:
   - Illustration
   - English text content with core vocabulary word highlighted
   - Translated text content with core vocabulary word highlighted

Ensure consistent styling across all pages while maintaining readability and visual appeal appropriate for age range "1-6".
tasks_output.name: generate_html_pages_task
tasks_output.expected_output: A list of print-ready HTML pages with integrated content
tasks_output.summary: Generate HTML pages that combine text content, translations, and illustrations...
